concept.title: Export data
concept.shortdesc: To keep a backup of data relating to nodes, packages, or containers, download a CSV file that contains the same information as the page you are currently viewing, including all filter selections.

conbody.p: To download resource data as a .csv file, click Export. The filename is <ui_page>_<timestamp>.csv, for example pd_export_nodes_2019-06-17_1054.csv.
